page.title: 18HURDY GURDY AND BAGPIPES
page.content:
The hurdy gurdy is a rather strange instrument.You have to wind a handle and play keys which changes the sound of which the handle makes.The hurdy gurdy has a drone sound like the bag pipes except you don't have to blow.
Scotland and Greece had bagpipes and all the countries between them had them too. England have only got one kind of bagpipes and they are called the Northumbrian pipes. The loudest bagpipes come from Scotland. The Greek bagpipes were made from the skin of a goat.
